resources.string: Your favorite Dota 2 hero has not been defined yet.

Your favorite Dota 2 hero is:

%s

What a fine choice!
What is your favorite Dota 2 hero?
Saved your favorite hero \'%s\' to device storage
Loaded your favorite Dota 2 hero \'%s\' from device storage

Overviews of top tournament and ranked matches currently being played and recently finished. Live matches are delayed just like in the Dota 2 spectator client.

 Tournament matches show the pro teams' names instead of "Radiant" and "Dire". Live ranked matches are sorted by average MMR and pro players are highlighted with a distinct color. Recent matches are sorted by time finished (most recent at the top of the list).

 Swipe left and right to switch between live and recent matches. Click once on a match to show or hide additional information. Quickly click twice on a ranked match to switch between pro players' official names and current Steam names.

 Type the command below a live match into your Dota 2 console and press Enter to start spectating the chosen match in your Dota 2 client.
App needs permission to access the current network state!
App needs permission to connect to the internet!
Network error. Please check your internet connection
